name: CV
body:
#William Madden
Curriculum Vitae

##Technical Skills

###Frontend design and development

* JavaScript (and HTML, CSS, and related web technologies) - 7 years experience
* AngularJS - 2 years experience
* Single page app technologies (Node.js, Grunt/Bower/Yeoman, Chrome platform APIs, Cordova/Phonegap) - 1 year experience
* Flex - 4 years experience

### Backend development
* Ruby on Rails - 7 years experience
* Node.js (Meteor, Express) - <1 year experience

## Education

### The University of Melbourne (2006 - 2011) Melbourne, Australia

* Bachelor of Computer Science

## Professional Experience

### Geddit, Founder (2012 - 2014)
Berlin, Germany - letsgeddit.com

* Geddit enables teachers to collect and use real-time individual learning data to deliver personalised education to every student, via web apps and dashboards
* Ruby on Rails, AngularJS, PubNub, deployed on Heroku
* Developed and open-sourced the Live Resource gem to enable real-time communication over PubNub between Rails and AngularJS
* Implemented SCRUM, designed and built the back- and frontend of the application, and instituted rigorous Q/A processes using Cucumber, Jasmine and RSpec

### Balanced Tree Software, Founder (2012 - 2013)
Berlin, Germany

* Software/Web development consultancy, custom web software and deployments for clients
* Collective91 â€“ Client, media industry. Media talent marketplace 
* Developed client products with Ruby/Ruby on Rails, JavaScript/HTML5, PostgreSQL, Heroku, Amazon EC2, Amazon S3

### Pro Medicus, Senior UI Developer (2011 - 2012)
Melbourne, Australia - promedicus.com.au

* Provider of radiology information systems servicing over 70% of radiology centres in Australia
* Worked as part of a SCRUM team leading development of the front-end Flex client
* Established Q/A procedures for the front-end system, refactored code-base for performance, quality and readability, performed memory and performance optimisation, added a test harness and implemented front-end tests, and migrated the existing project from SVN to Git
* Implemented and open-sourced the Promise/Deferred pattern for ActionScript (ASDeferred)

### PlayUp, Senior Developer (2010 - 2011)
Melbourne, Australia - playup.com

* Online social sports games company
* Worked as part of several teams implementing single page web apps and games and Cordova-powered mobile applications in JS (with Backbone) and Ruby on Rails, using SCRUM

### Silverpond, Senior Developer (2007 - 2010)
Melbourne, Australia - silverpond.com.au

* Software consultancy in Melbourne
* Led frontend development for a number of large client projects in Flex/AS and HTML/JS, with Ruby on Rails and ASP/C# backends

## Referees

### Anthony Hall
Pro Medicus, CTO

* Tel: 	+61 3 9429 8800
* Email: 	hall@promed.com.au

### Jonathan Chang
Silverpond, Managing Director

* Tel: 	+61 411 727 819
* Email: 	jonathan.chang@silverpond.com.au

### Neil Killick
Product Manager, Red Bubble
(Formerly PlayUp, Product Owner)

* Tel: 	+61 434 833 963
* Email: 	neil@iterative.com.au
* Web: 	neilkillick.com
